00048 CNCorrelationEngine * CNCorrelationEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00049 {
00050     if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == CNCorrelationEngine::EngineName())
00051         return (CNCorrelationEngine *)engine;
00052     return NULL;
00053 }

00089 /**
00090  * @brief Print any standard methods used by the engine
00091  * @param std::ostream& - The specified output stream
00092  */
00093 void CNCorrelationEngine::printStandardMethods(std::ostream &out) {
00094     if (m_pstdMethods == NULL) {return;}
00095     std::map<std::string,std::string>::iterator iter;
00096     out << std::endl << "Standard Methods:" << std::endl;
00097       unsigned int maxLength = 0;
00098       for(iter = m_pstdMethods->begin(); iter != m_pstdMethods->end(); iter++) {
00099         if(iter->first.size() > maxLength)
00100         maxLength = (unsigned int)iter->first.size();
00101       }
00102       for(iter = m_pstdMethods->begin(); iter != m_pstdMethods->end(); iter++) {
00103         unsigned int currentLength = 0;
00104         out << " '" << iter->first << "' ";
00105         currentLength = (unsigned int)iter->first.size();
00106         while(currentLength < maxLength + 1) {
00107           out.put(' ');
00108           currentLength++;
00109         }
00110         out << iter->second << std::endl;
00111       }
00112 }

00117 void CNCorrelationEngine::defineOptions() {
00118 
00119   defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00120   defineOption("", "cychp-files", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00121                      "Text file specifying cychp files to process, one per line with the "
00122                      "first line being 'cychp_files'.",
00123                      "");
00124   defineOption("","start-file-number", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00125                     "Start File Number",
00126                     "-1");
00127   defineOption("","end-file-number", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00128                     "End File Number",
00129                     "-1");
00130 
00131   defineOptionSection("Output Options");
00132   defineOption("", "a5-output", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00133                     "A5 output correlation matrix file.", "");
00134   defineOption("", "text-output", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00135                     "Text output correlation matrix file.", "");
00136 
00137   defineOptionSection("Analysis Options");
00138 
00139   defineOptionSection("Misc Options");
00140   defineOption("", "explain", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00141                     "Explain a particular operation (i.e. --explain additional-Correlations-reference-method).",
00142                     "");
00143 
00144   defineOptionSection("Advanced Options");
00145   defineOption("","xChromosome", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00146                     "X Chromosome",
00147                     "24");
00148   defineOption("","yChromosome", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00149                     "Y Chromosome",
00150                     "25");
00151 
00152   defineOptionSection("Engine Options (Not used on command line)");
00153   defOptMult("", "cychps", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00154                      "CYCHP files to process.",
00155                      "");
00156 }

00169 void getCychpInputFiles(const std::string& str, std::vector<std::string> &cychpFiles, BaseEngine *engine) {
00170     if(engine->getOpt(str)!="") {
00171       affx::TsvFile tsv;
00172 #ifdef WIN32
00173       tsv.m_optEscapeOk = false;
00174 #endif
00175       std::string cychpFilesFile = engine->getOpt(str);
00176       string file;
00177       tsv.bind(0, "cychp_files", &file, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00178       if(tsv.open(cychpFilesFile) != affx::TSV_OK) {
00179         Err::errAbort("Couldn't open cychp-files file: " + cychpFilesFile);
00180       }
00181       tsv.rewind();
00182       while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00183         cychpFiles.push_back(file);
00184       }
00185       tsv.close();
00186       Verbose::out(1, "Read " + ToStr(cychpFiles.size()) + " cychp files from: " + Fs::basename(cychpFilesFile));
00187     } else {
00188         Err::errAbort("Please specify the " + str + " parameter.");
00189     }
00190 }

00192 /**
00193  * @brief Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00194  */
00195 void CNCorrelationEngine::checkOptionsImp() {
00196 
00197     defineStates();
00198 
00199     // file is not used by the engine
00200     //setLibFileOpt("config-file");
00201 
00202     if(getOpt("explain") != "") { explain(); exit(0); }
00203 
00204     checkParameters();
00205     Verbose::out(4, "Parameters are ok.");
00206 
00207     /* Read in cychp file list from other file if specified. */
00208     vector<string> cychpFiles;
00209     getCychpInputFiles("cychp-files", cychpFiles, this);
00210     if(cychpFiles.size() == 0)
00211         Err::errAbort("No CYCHP files specified.");
00212     setOpt("cychps",cychpFiles);
00213     cychpFiles.clear();
00214 
00215     for (unsigned int uiIndex = 0; (uiIndex < getOptVector("cychps").size()); uiIndex++)
00216     {
00217         if (Fs::fileExists(getOptVector("cychps")[uiIndex])==false) {
00218             Err::errAbort("A file specified as a CYCHP input does not exist:\t" + getOptVector("cychps")[uiIndex]);
00219         }
00220     }
00221 }

00223 /**
00224  * @brief Run the specified analysis
00225  */
00226 void CNCorrelationEngine::runImp() {
00227   // make this all one big try catch to make sure destructors are
00228   // called if exceptions thrown.
00229   try { // outer try for handling the exception.
00230     try { // inner try for memory clean up.
00231       calculateCorrelation();
00232     } // inner try end
00233     catch (...) {
00234       // Free up any allocated memory here...
00235         clear();
00236       // re-throw the unchanged exception.
00237       throw;
00238     }
00239   } // outer try end
00240   /* When things go wrong see if we can die gracefully here. */
00241   catch(Except &e) {
00242     Verbose::out(0,"");
00243     error("Exception caught. "
00244                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00245   }
00246   catch(const std::bad_alloc &e) {
00247     Verbose::out(0,"");
00248     error("std::bad_alloc caught. "
00249                   "The application has run out of memory. "
00250                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00251   }
00252   catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException &ce) {
00253     Verbose::out(0,"");
00254     error("affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException caught. "
00255                    "Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console library has thrown an exception. "
00256                   "Message is: " + affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ce.Description()));
00257   }
00258   catch(BroadException &e) {
00259     Verbose::out(0,"");
00260     error("BroadException caught. "
00261                   "Message is: '" + ToStr(e.m_msg) + "' source file: '" + ToStr(e.m_sourcefile) +
00262                   ":" + ToStr(e.m_sourceline) + "'");
00263   }
00264   catch(const std::exception &e) {
00265     Verbose::out(0,"");
00266     error("std::exception caught. "
00267                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00268   }
00269   catch(const BaseException &e) {
00270     Verbose::out(0,"");
00271     error("newmat BaseException caught. "
00272                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00273   }
00274   catch(...) {
00275     Verbose::out(0,"");
00276     error("Unknown exception caught. "
00277                   "No message is available.");
00278   }
00279   // free any allocated memory here...
00280   clear();
00281 }

00289 
00290 void CNCorrelationEngine::calculateCorrelation()
00291 {
00292     if (getOpt("a5-output") == "") {Err::errAbort("a5-output must be specified, text-output is optional.");}
00293     unsigned int uiCychpCount1 = getOptVector("cychps").size();
00294     unsigned int uiCychpCount2 = (getOptInt("end-file-number") - getOptInt("start-file-number") + 1);
00295 
00296     if (getOptInt("start-file-number") < 1) {Err::errAbort("start-file-number must be greater than or equal to 1.");}
00297     if (getOptInt("end-file-number") < 1) {Err::errAbort("end-file-number must be greater than or equal to 1.");}
00298     if (getOptInt("start-file-number") > uiCychpCount1) {Err::errAbort("start-file-number must be less than or equal to " + ::getInt(uiCychpCount1) + ".");}
00299     if (getOptInt("end-file-number") > uiCychpCount1) {Err::errAbort("end-file-number must be less than or equal to " + ::getInt(uiCychpCount1) + ".");}
00300     if (getOptInt("end-file-number") < getOptInt("start-file-number")) {Err::errAbort("end-file-number must be greater than or equal to start-file-number.");}
00301 
00302     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double> mx(uiCychpCount2, uiCychpCount1);
00303     Verbose::out(1, "*");
00304     CNCychp cychp;
00305     AffxArray<CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber> v;
00306 
00307     CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pv = new CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber[3000000];
00308     v.resize(3000000);
00309     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < 3000000); iIndex++)
00310     {
00311         v[iIndex] = &pv[iIndex];
00312     }
00313     int iProbeSetCount = -1;
00314     int iX = getOptInt("xChromosome");
00315     int iY = getOptInt("yChromosome");
00316 
00317     // Load up the Log2Ratios in a5 format.
00318     Verbose::out(1, "*");
00319     Verbose::out(1, "Loading Log2Ratios...");
00320     affx::File5_File file5;
00321     affx::File5_Group* group5;
00322     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00323 
00324     AffxString strFileName = getOpt("a5-output");
00325     try
00326     {
00327         file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_RW);
00328         group5 = file5.openGroup("Cyto2", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00329     } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00330     try
00331     {
00332         for (unsigned int uiIndex = (getOptInt("start-file-number") - 1); (uiIndex < getOptInt("end-file-number")); uiIndex++)
00333         {
00334             AffxString strFileName2 = getOptVector("cychps").at(uiIndex);
00335             cychp.readFile(strFileName2, v, false);
00336             tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Log2Ratios-2-" + ::getInt(uiIndex), affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00337             tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "Log2Ratios", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00338             if (uiIndex == (getOptInt("start-file-number") - 1)) {iProbeSetCount = 0;}
00339             int iCount = 0;
00340             for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < v.size()); iProbeSetIndex++)
00341             {
00342                 if ((v[iProbeSetIndex]->getChromosome() != 0) && (v[iProbeSetIndex]->getChromosome() != iX) && (v[iProbeSetIndex]->getChromosome() != iY))
00343                 {
00344                     if (uiIndex == (getOptInt("start-file-number") - 1)) {iProbeSetCount++;}
00345                     iCount++;
00346                     tsv5->set_d(0, 0, v[iProbeSetIndex]->getLog2Ratio());
00347                     tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00348                 }
00349             }
00350             tsv5->close();
00351             delete tsv5;
00352             if (iCount != iProbeSetCount) {Err::errAbort("Probe Set counts do not match.");}
00353         }
00354     } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00355 
00356     // Process the log2 Ratios.
00357     std::vector<double> vMeans1(uiCychpCount1);
00358     std::vector<double> vMeans2(uiCychpCount1);
00359 
00360     std::vector<double> vLog2Ratios1(iProbeSetCount);
00361     std::vector<double> vLog2Ratios2(iProbeSetCount);
00362     Verbose::out(1, "*");
00363     Verbose::out(1, "Calculating Correlations...");
00364     for (unsigned int uiIndex = 0; (uiIndex < uiCychpCount1); uiIndex++)
00365     {
00366         AffxString strFileName1 = getOptVector("cychps").at(uiIndex);
00367         cychp.readFile(strFileName1, v, false);
00368         int i = 0;
00369         for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < v.size()); iProbeSetIndex++)
00370         {
00371             if ((v[iProbeSetIndex]->getChromosome() != 0) && (v[iProbeSetIndex]->getChromosome() != iX) && (v[iProbeSetIndex]->getChromosome() != iY))
00372             {
00373                 if (i >= iProbeSetCount) {Err::errAbort("Probe Set counts do not match.");}
00374                 vLog2Ratios1[i] = v[iProbeSetIndex]->getLog2Ratio();
00375                 i++;
00376             }
00377         }
00378         if (i != iProbeSetCount) {Err::errAbort("Probe Set counts do not match.");}
00379         for (unsigned int uiIndex2 = (getOptInt("start-file-number") - 1); (uiIndex2 <= (getOptInt("end-file-number") - 1)); uiIndex2++)
00380         {
00381             if (uiIndex == uiIndex2) {mx.set((uiIndex2 - (getOptInt("start-file-number") - 1)), uiIndex, 1.0); continue;}
00382             if (uiIndex > uiIndex2) {continue;}
00383             tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Log2Ratios-2-" + ::getInt(uiIndex2), affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00384             int i = 0;
00385             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00386             {
00387                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &vLog2Ratios2[i]);
00388                 i++;
00389             }
00390             tsv5->close();
00391             delete tsv5;
00392             if (vMeans1[uiIndex] == 0)
00393             {
00394                 double dSum = 0;
00395                 for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00396                 {
00397                     dSum += vLog2Ratios1[iProbeSetIndex];
00398                 }
00399                 vMeans1[uiIndex] = (dSum / (double)iProbeSetCount);
00400             }
00401             if (vMeans2[uiIndex2] == 0)
00402             {
00403                 double dSum = 0;
00404                 for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00405                 {
00406                     dSum += vLog2Ratios2[iProbeSetIndex];
00407                 }
00408                 vMeans2[uiIndex2] = (dSum / (double)iProbeSetCount);
00409             }
00410             double dNumerator = 0;
00411             double d1 = 0;
00412             double d2 = 0;
00413             for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00414             {
00415                 dNumerator += (vLog2Ratios1[iProbeSetIndex] - vMeans1[uiIndex]) * (vLog2Ratios2[iProbeSetIndex] - vMeans2[uiIndex2]);
00416                 d1 += (vLog2Ratios1[iProbeSetIndex] - vMeans1[uiIndex]) * (vLog2Ratios1[iProbeSetIndex] - vMeans1[uiIndex]);
00417                 d2 += (vLog2Ratios2[iProbeSetIndex] - vMeans2[uiIndex2]) * (vLog2Ratios2[iProbeSetIndex] - vMeans2[uiIndex2]);
00418             }
00419             mx.set((uiIndex2 - (getOptInt("start-file-number") - 1)), uiIndex, (dNumerator / sqrt(d1) / sqrt(d2)));
00420         }
00421     }
00422     group5->close();
00423     delete group5;
00424     file5.close();
00425 
00426     delete[] pv;
00427 
00428   Fs::rm(strFileName,false);
00429 
00430     Verbose::out(1, "*");
00431     Verbose::out(1, "Writing out Correlations...");
00432 
00433     try
00434     {
00435         file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_RW);
00436         group5 = file5.openGroup("Cyto2", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00437         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Correlations", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00438         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < uiCychpCount2); iIndex++)
00439         {
00440             tsv5->defineColumn(0, iIndex, "Correlation_" + ::getInt(iIndex + 1), affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00441         }
00442         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < uiCychpCount1); iIndex++)
00443         {
00444             for (int iIndex2 = 0; (iIndex2 < uiCychpCount2); iIndex2++)
00445             {
00446                 tsv5->set_d(0, iIndex2, mx.get(iIndex2, iIndex));
00447             }
00448             tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00449         }
00450         tsv5->close();
00451         delete tsv5;
00452         group5->close();
00453         delete group5;
00454         file5.close();
00455     } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00456 
00457     strFileName = getOpt("text-output");
00458     if (!strFileName.empty())  {
00459       affx::TsvFile tsv;
00460       tsv.writeOpen(strFileName);
00461       AffxString str;
00462       for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < uiCychpCount1); iIndex++) {
00463         for (int iIndex2 = 0; (iIndex2 < uiCychpCount2); iIndex2++) {
00464           tsv.set(0,iIndex2, ::getDouble(mx.get(iIndex2, iIndex), 6));
00465         }
00466         tsv.writeLevel(0);
00467       }
00468       tsv.clear();
00469 
00470     }
00471 }
